PackageOracle.name: DA_PRODUCT_CLASS_TYPE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_PRODUCT_CLASS_TYPE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.10.177920000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,prod_clas_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,prod_clas_type_desc IN VARCHAR2
,prod_clas_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,prod_clas_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_product_class_type;

body.name: DA_PRODUCT_CLASS_TYPE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_PRODUCT_CLASS_TYPE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.10.187239000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,prod_clas_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,prod_clas_type_desc IN VARCHAR2
,prod_clas_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_product_class_type.add, parms=' || prod_clas_type_nm || '|' || prod_clas_type_desc || '|' || prod_clas_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_product_class_type a
(
a.prod_clas_type_nm
,a.prod_clas_type_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.prod_clas_type_cd
)
VALUES
(
add.prod_clas_type_nm
,add.prod_clas_type_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
,add.prod_clas_type_cd
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_product_class_type.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,prod_clas_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_product_class_type.del, parms=' || prod_clas_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_product_class_type a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.prod_clas_type_cd = del.prod_clas_type_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_product_class_type.del');

END del;

END da_product_class_type;
